name: The Fight against the Test-textured Cubes
name_original: The Fight against the Test-textured Cubes
description:
This "Game" was made in 8 Minutes in Python and its SHIT!!

And you must Compile it for yourself because it does not Work as EXE.

#qzeq

Install Instructions:

1. Install Python Version 3.X.X

2. Install Ursina with cmd: pip install ursina

3.Execute main.py

Controls:

Reload: Right Mouse Button

Shoot: Left Mouse Button

Moove: W, A, S, D

Look: Mouse
